title: The Kangaroos
creator_credit: Peter Du Cane and David Moore
brief_description: An amazingly diverse group of marsupials, the kangaroos range from small hare-wallabies and curious tree dwelling kangaroos in the Queensland rainforests, to the great Red, Euro and Grey Kangaroos of the plains, hills and forests. The behaviour of these and other kangaroos is the subject of this program.
